response.overview: Harking back to the classic horror movie "Fade to Black", "Film Freak" is about a woman who works at the Jacksonville Times-Union and trying to outrun her past because of her boyfriend, who was an avid film freak who killed her parents on Friday the 13th wearing a Jason Voorhees mask. Thinking he was in an insane asylum, the boyfriend breaks out wearing a Michael Myers costume and begins to head for her once again, killing and dressing up as various serial killers from films, including Freddy Krueger, Ghostface from "Scream" and Jason Voorhees.
response.title: Film Freak
